name: Baikal Spirit (Barguzin Wind)
shortLoreBlurb: Baikal Spirit (Barguzin Wind) is a spirit from Siberia linked to lake, winds. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Baikal Spirit (Barguzin Wind) is a spirit from Siberia linked to lake, winds. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains.
